title: Financial Literacy
intro: Let's learn how to manage your finances

budgetBasics.title: Personal Budget Basics
budgetBasics.description: Learn to plan income and expenses

trackExpenses.title: Track all expenses
trackExpenses.description: Record every expense for a month — this will help find money leaks

oneCategory.title: One category rule
oneCategory.description: Choose one expense category to reduce each month

emergencyFund.title: Emergency fund
emergencyFund.description: Save 3-6 months of expenses for unexpected situations

compoundInterest.title: Compound interest
compoundInterest.description: Start investing as early as possible, time is your best ally

wait24Hours.title: 24-hour rule
wait24Hours.description: Wait a day before making large purchases — this helps avoid impulsive spending

autoSavings.title: Automate savings
autoSavings.description: Set up automatic transfer of part of your income to a savings account right after payday

diversification.title: Diversification
diversification.description: Don't put all eggs in one basket — spread assets across different instruments
